channel.title: Rep -
channel.description:
Okay, i don't really get it.
Rep causes drama, you don't get respected if you have high rep.
I mean no offence, but look at Silab, she is getting [b]dis[/b]respected because of her high rep.
I am kinda just wondering why we even have it?
It doesn't benefit us at all, you can't smite rep, Thank god.
I just don't see the good side of rep, only the bad.
Explain.

item.title: Rep -
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:31, topic:174700”][quote author=billygotshot link=topic=235148.msg2013261#msg2013261 date=1201244932]

The cap on rep was meant to be 200, but instead of actually capping it there I just capped the most rep you could give at 200/15. So I guess I will go ahead and physically cap it at 200. I never liked the idea of Rep- personally, as it seems to just cause problems, but I am open to suggestions…

why not a number that can evenly be divided by 15? because 200/15 is 13.33333. just change it to 195
[/quote]

Integer division automatically truncates 13.333333 to 13 :)[/quote]

aww but 195 is such a uneven number

Read full topic

The cap on rep was meant to be 200, but instead of actually capping it there I just capped the most rep you could give at 200/15. So I guess I will go ahead and physically cap it at 200. I never liked the idea of Rep- personally, as it seems to just cause problems, but I am open to suggestions…
[/quote]

why not a number that can evenly be divided by 15? because 200/15 is 13.33333. just change it to 195 :)[/quote]

item.title: Rep -
item.dc:creator: @Carson Carson
item.description:
@Carson wrote:

Taharok, That old reputation system sounds better then the one we have now.

Read full topic

item.title: Rep -
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“ThatOneServer, post:26, topic:174700”][quote author=cooper link=topic=235148.msg2006996#msg2006996 date=1200914539]

God of ikliki informed me today that many of the members on moparscape with rep that was > 200 are now leaving and going to his site. That is great news, as we do not want people here that are only here for the rep anyway. So some good has already come of it

I feel sorry for God of Ikiliki
[/quote]

I lol’d

Rep is just a measure of how many friends you have in moparscape. I remember when i was into that shit, i was within the first 30 to get 15 rep.[/quote]

The first 30 people to have > 15 rep were cms and vets.

[quote=“ThatOneServer, post:28, topic:174700”]Reputation is what real people want. Not ‘rep’.

Reputation is measured in respect.

Rep is measured in how many people thought your awesome ‘tut on how to System.out.println’.[/quote]

http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/reputation

Read definition three. Is not rep on this site exactly as it is supposed to be? Yes, who the hell cares if people want rep on moparscape. They want attention, which the people who flame them (generally from here) already have (mainly because they DO flame the moparscapers). Personally, I thought the old rep system was fine with the exception of giving everyone the ability to rep. I think that people should have started at 0 rep, could not give over 1 rep per week to one person, and could not give rep points until after they reached over 15. However, Moparisthebest chose to copy kaitnieks.

Read full topic
